- generate tracks in appropriate format (such as bed/interact.bed)
https://genome.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/help/interact.html

```{r make bedgraph file for GWAS Manhattan plot}
library(dplyr)
#make bedgraph for SNPs
# GWAS<-data.table::fread(file = "~/Google Drive/WORK/CF PhD/GWAS/scz2021/PGC3_SCZ_wave3_public.v2_GRCh37.tsv.gz",
#                         select = c("CHR",	"SNP",	"BP", "OR",	"P"), fill=T)
GWAS<-data.table::fread(file = "~/Google Drive/WORK/CF PhD/UCSC_browser/SavageJansen_2018_intelligence_metaanalysis_hg19.txt",
                        select = c("CHR",	"SNP",	"POS", "stdBeta",	"P"), fill=T)
GWAS
#GWAS[GWAS$CHR=="1" & GWAS$BP==249220525,]
hist(GWAS$P, breaks = 1000)
GWAS$neglog10p <- -log10(GWAS$P)
hist(GWAS$neglog10p, breaks = 1000)
GWAS[GWAS$P<10^-8,]

# bedgraph format http://genome.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/help/bedgraph.html
# chromA  chromStartA  chromEndA  dataValueA
GWAS$CHR<-paste0("chr",GWAS$CHR)
GWAS$start<-GWAS$POS-1
#GWAS[GWAS$CHR=="chr1" & GWAS$BP==249220525,]
psych::describe(GWAS$neglog10p)
table(GWAS$CHR)
GWAS[GWAS$CHR=="chr23"]$CHR<-"chrX"

#write out header line
cat("track type=bedGraph name=SavageJansen_2018_intelligence_metaanalysis description=SavageJansen_2018_intelligence_metaanalysis visibility=display_mode color=125,0,238 altColor=125,0,238 priority=high autoScale=on alwaysZero=on gridDefault=on graphType=bar\n",
    file="/Users/eosimo/Google Drive/WORK/CF PhD/UCSC_browser/SavageJansen_2018_intelligence_metaanalysis.bedgraph", append=F)
#write out data to same file
data.table::fwrite(
  x = dplyr::select(.data = GWAS, CHR, start, POS, neglog10p) %>% na.exclude(), 
  append = T, sep = "\t", col.names = F, row.names = F, quote = F, scipen = 999,
  file = "/Users/eosimo/Google Drive/WORK/CF PhD/UCSC_browser/SavageJansen_2018_intelligence_metaanalysis.bedgraph")
```

- make sure bed files are sorted

``` {bash -- bedgraph into bigWig: sort file, remove duplicated lines, convert to wig, upload}
cd /Users/eosimo/Google\ Drive/WORK/CF\ PhD/UCSC_browser/

<!-- sort and remove duplications (-u) based on first 3 cols (-k1,3) only -->
sort -k1,3 -u SavageJansen_2018_intelligence_metaanalysis.bedgraph | bedtools sort -i > SavageJansen_2018_intelligence_metaanalysis_sort.bedgraph


bedGraphToBigWig /Users/eosimo/Google\ Drive/WORK/CF\ PhD/UCSC_browser/SavageJansen_2018_intelligence_metaanalysis_sort.bedgraph http://hgdownload.cse.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/hg19/bigZips/hg19.chrom.sizes /Users/eosimo/Google\ Drive/WORK/CF\ PhD/UCSC_browser/UCSCtrackHub/data_files/SavageJansen_2018_intelligence_metaanalysis_sort_hg19.bw

<!-- copy onto shire -->
rsync -P /Users/eosimo/Google\ Drive/WORK/CF\ PhD/UCSC_browser/UCSCtrackHub/data_files/SavageJansen_2018_intelligence_metaanalysis_sort_hg19.bw emanuele@193.60.222.200:/mnt/storage/www/ucsc_hub/eosimo/
```



``` {bash -- bed into bigBed: sort file, remove duplicated lines, convert to bb, upload}
cd /Users/eosimo/Google\ Drive/WORK/CF\ PhD/UCSC_browser/

<!-- sort and remove duplications (-u) based on first 3 cols (-k1,3) only -->
sort -k1,3 -u brainSNVs_hg19_UCSC.bed | bedtools sort -i > brainSNVs_hg19_UCSC_sort.bed


bedToBigBed -as=bb.as -type=bed6+4 brainSNVs_hg19_UCSC_sort.bed http://hgdownload.cse.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/hg19/bigZips/hg19.chrom.sizes brainSNVs_hg19_UCSC_sort.bb

<!-- simple bed file -->
bedToBigBed -type=bed6 LDblocks_hg19_sort.bed http://hgdownload.cse.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/hg19/bigZips/hg19.chrom.sizes LDblocks_hg19_sort.bb

<!-- copy onto shire -->
rsync -P LDblocks_hg19_sort.bb emanuele@193.60.222.200:/mnt/storage/www/ucsc_hub/eosimo/
```

the link to load the track will be trackhub.genereg.net/eosimo/
